channel.title: +1 Forward - Ryne
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/ryne
Rach and Rich bring on Adam and Thryn of Furtive Shambles to talk about their game Ryne, which is funding on Indie Go Go until August 21
Timecodes: 0:01:45 - Read a Sitch about PbtA and Actual Play 0:16:11 - Open Your Brain to Ryne 0:28:57 - Act Under Fire in a land of ice seeking something hidden away
Check out Ryne on Indie Go Go: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ryne
You can find Furtive Shambles here: http://furtiveshambles.com/
